replace.flavor: No rest. No mercy. No matter what.
Do not concern yourself with my origin, my race, or my ancestry. Seek my record in the pits, and then make your wager.
The Aurora had transformed her into a relentless force of destruction.
Long ago, birds of paradise littered the skies. Thanks to the city's sprawl, most now exist as pets of society's elite.
Long ago, birds of paradise littered the skies. Thanks to the city's sprawl, most now exist as pets of society's elite.
As Glissa searches for the truth about Memnarch, Bosh searches to unearth the secrets buried deep in his memory.
The rifted multiverse became a sea of conflciting realities, each peopled by possible versions of every living being.
For the chronatog, there is no meal like the present.
"My power is as vast as the plains, my strength is that of mountains. Each wave that crashes upon the shore thunders like blood in my veins." — Memoirs
Elspeth's squires do not seek advancement. For them, no jknightly glory could surpass the glory of serving their champion.
"That such delicate creatures could become so powerful in the embrace of winter is yet more proof that I am right." — Heidar, Rimewind Master
Virtue is an inner light that can prevail in every soul.
"We have been patient. We have planned our attack. We are ready... now." — Eladamri, Lord of Leaves
"For what are leaves but countless blades to fight a countless foe on high" — Elvish hymn
He provides a safe path to nowhere.
He provides a safe path to nowhere.
Why do you weep for the dead? I rejoice, for they have died for me.
"For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim." — Sisay
They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.
They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.
It's drawn to the scent of screaming.
It's drawn to the scent of screaming.
His roots reach deep, nurtured not by soil and rain, but by millennia of experience.
You might leave here, Chenndra, should another take your place...
Seeking the company of plants ensures that your wits will go to seed.
Each of his twenty-two braids is bound with bone and leather from a foe.
I have lived long, and I remember how this city once was. If my death serves to bring back the Ravnica in my memory, then so be it.
Sacrificial rites take place before an audience of cheerign cultists, each begging to be the next on stage.
The blood of the demons quickened as their master rose over the battlefield. The blood of the angels also quickened: here was the chance to finally end the war started millennia ago.
No two see the same Maro.
The sacred Anima's eyes are blind to all but the grandest truths.
A hero fails, a martyr falls. Time twists and destinies interchange.
Unaware of Lorwyn's diversity, it sees only itself, refelected a thousand times over.
"I looked into its eyes, and its soul was so empty I saw no reflection, no light there." — Crovax
"I have seen the horrors Kaervek has freed. My betrayal is certain — but of Kaervek or of Jamuraa, I cannot say." — Jolrael
The oni leapt easily from peak to peak, toying with its victims, its voice a purry frmo the rumbling depths of nightmare.
"I have always imagined my mother as such a woman, strong and wise." — Sisay, journal
In its heart lies the secret of immortality.
In its heart lies the secret of immortality.
Ocassionally, members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldy pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.
He wastes his amazing talents on proving how amazing he really is.
Some believe that Raksha, yougnest of the kha, is the reincarnation of Dakan, the first and mightiest of leonin leaders.
It's harvest time.
The Orzhov contract the Izzet to animate slum districts and banish them to the wastes. The Gruul adopt them and send them back to the city for vengeance.
Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.
Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.
His family was the first to reach out to the human monks. He soon knew as many koans as he did blade strikes.
Her children are ever part of her.
"Some goblins are expendable. Some are impossible to get rid of. But he's both — at the same time!" — Starke
Int he Jamuraan jungles, there is often no serpating beauty from danger.
It is said the wind will blow the world past if you wait long enough.
None know if this Giant is the result of abberant magics, Siamese twins, or a mentalist's schizophrenia.
"Your life with set with the sun."
"I will fight only the way nature intended-and nature intended us to win."
